content:
Hi guys, I believe the test data used on this test is invalid (due to an invariant rule), also the spec link locations seem to still be pointing to the sep build, probably should update link from 2016Sep to 2017Jan
https://projectcrucible.org/servers/56ac11f76372752b95020000#5895c87e6372756e51060000/resourcetest_requestgroup/X010_RequestGroup
Great thanks. @Robert Scanlon can you make these updates?
Sure, thanks for the bug reports. I created a couple of tickets in github... pointing the documentation to 1.8.0 will be done today but the invariant issue might take a little while longer.
Should I log issues over on github instead as I find thiem?
